title: Library Include Should Store Relative Path
description: When including a library in a report design, the software should save the relative path instead of the absolute path.
OB: Currently, the report design stores the absolute path of the library as follows: <property name='fileName'/E:/birt/sampleReports/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary</property> <property name='namespace'lib1</property>
EB: Library include should store relative path. When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if my report design is in $project/test, the library's path should be relative to this location.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create a new report design or open an existing one.
3. Include a library in the report design.
4. Check the path of the included library in the report design properties.
